translations: n.血管收缩剂；血管收缩神经

sentences.sentence: One option is to try peripheral vasoconstrictors.
sentences.translation: 一种选择可以尝试给予外周血管收缩剂。

sentences.sentence: New medicines such as vasoconstrictors and V2-receptors of vasopressin maybe beneficial in patients with ascites in liver cirrhosis.
sentences.translation: 新药(如V 2受拮抗剂和血管收缩剂等)对肝硬化腹水的治疗可能带来希望。

sentences.sentence: Angiotensin II is one of the most potent vasoconstrictors known. It is also active in the central nervous system and adrenal glands and stimulates aldosterone secretion, resulting in salt retention.
sentences.translation: 血管紧张素ii是已知的最强烈的血管收缩剂之一，它对中枢神经系统及肾上腺也有活性，能刺激肾上腺素分泌，导致钠潴留。
